actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To repeal the restrictions added by the Tax Reform Act of 1986 on the deducation for retirement savings.

summary.text: Repeals provisions of the Tax Reform Act of 1986 that place limitations on: (1) individual retirement account deductions for active participants in certain pension plans; and (2) nondeductible contributions to individual retirement plans. Applies such provisions retroactively with respect to tax years 1987 and thereafter.

titles.title: To repeal the restrictions added by the Tax Reform Act of 1986 on the deducation for retirement savings.
